official_title: A Multicenter and Randomized Prospective Study for Improving the Outcome of Childhood Acute Promyeloid Leukemia

criteria.raw_text:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients less than 16 years old with newly diagnosed PML-RARa positive acute promyelocytic leukemia.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients who have coma, convulsion or paralysis due to intracranial hemorrhage or central nervous system leukemia at diagnosis.

sex: ALL

maximumAge: 16 Years

stdAges: ['CHILD']
criteria.inclusion: Patients less than 16 years old with newly diagnosed PML-RARa positive acute promyelocytic leukemia.
criteria.exclusion: Patients who have coma, convulsion or paralysis due to intracranial hemorrhage or central nervous system leukemia at diagnosis.
